output: html_document

```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(pwr)
```

We simulate a difference in means and compute a basic power estimate for a two-sample t-test.

```{r}
set.seed(42)
n_per_group <- 60
control <- rnorm(n_per_group, 0.0, 1)
treat   <- rnorm(n_per_group, 0.35, 1)  # small-to-medium effect
d <- (mean(treat) - mean(control)) / sd(c(control,treat))
d
pwr.t.test(d=d, type="two.sample", sig.level=.05, power=NULL)
```
